statements: SELECT * FROM drug_sales;
SELECT sale_id, drug_name, sale_date FROM drug_sales;
SELECT sale_id, drug_name, sale_quantity, sale_amount FROM drug_sales WHERE sale_quantity > 100;
SELECT sale_id, drug_name, sale_date, sale_amount FROM drug_sales WHERE sale_amount < 500.00;
SELECT sale_id, drug_name, sale_quantity, sale_amount FROM drug_sales ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM drug_sales WHERE sale_quantity > 100 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT drug_name, sale_quantity, sale_amount FROM drug_sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY sale_quantity ASC, sale_amount DESC
SELECT sale_id, drug_name, sale_date, sale_amount FROM drug_sales WHERE drug_name LIKE '%aspirin%' AND sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date ASC
SELECT sale_id, drug_name, sale_date, sale_quantity FROM drug_sales WHERE sale_date >= '2022-05-01' AND sale_amount <= 500 ORDER BY sale_quantity DESC, sale_date ASC
SELECT * FROM drug_sales WHERE sale_amount = (SELECT MAX(sale_amount) FROM drug_sales)
SELECT * FROM drug_sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sale_id, drug_name, quantity_sold FROM drug_sales WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT drug_name, SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_quantity_sold FROM drug_sales GROUP BY drug_name HAVING total_quantity_sold > 100;
SELECT drug_name, units_in_stock FROM drug_inventory ORDER BY units_in_stock ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM drug_inventory WHERE expiry_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT * FROM drug_sales WHERE quantity_sold > 100 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT drug_name, SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_sold FROM drug_sales GROUP BY drug_name;
SELECT sale_id, drug_name, sale_date, quantity_sold FROM drug_sales WHERE sale_date > '2022-01-01' AND quantity_sold BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT drug_name, SUM(units_in_stock) AS total_stock FROM drug_inventory GROUP BY drug_name HAVING total_stock < 50;
SELECT * FROM drug_sales JOIN drug_inventory ON drug_sales.drug_name = drug_inventory.drug_name WHERE drug_sales.quantity_sold > 50 AND drug_inventory.units_in_stock > 0 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM drugs;
SELECT drug_name, quantity_sold FROM drugs ORDER BY sales_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM drugs WHERE quantity_sold > 100 ORDER BY quantity_sold ASC;
SELECT drug_name, sales_date FROM sales_report WHERE sales_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM drug_categories;
SELECT * FROM drugs;
SELECT drug_name, quantity_sold FROM drugs WHERE sales_date <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT d.drug_name, d.quantity_sold, c.category_name FROM drugs d JOIN drug_categories c ON d.drug_id = c.category_id;
SELECT d.drug_name, SUM(sr.quantity_sold) AS total_quantity_sold FROM drugs d JOIN sales_report sr ON d.drug_id = sr.drug_id GROUP BY d.drug_name;
SELECT drug_name, quantity_sold FROM drugs ORDER BY quantity_sold DESC, sales_date ASC;
SELECT drug_id, drug_name, manufacturer FROM drugs;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT rep_name, sales_region FROM sales_representatives WHERE rep_id = 3;
SELECT drug_name, sale_date, sale_amount FROM drugs JOIN sales ON drugs.drug_id = sales.drug_id;
SELECT * FROM drugs WHERE manufacturer = 'Pfizer';
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer FROM drugs WHERE drug_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_address LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT sale_id, drug_name, sale_date FROM sales JOIN drugs ON sales.drug_id = drugs.drug_id WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT rep_name, sales_region FROM sales_representatives WHERE rep_id = 3;
SELECT drug_name, price FROM drugs ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sale_date;
SELECT customer_name, city FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT sale_id, quantity, total_price FROM sales WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT emp_name, emp_role FROM employees ORDER BY emp_name ASC;
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer, price FROM drugs WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer, price FROM drugs JOIN sales ON drugs.drug_id = sales.drug_id WHERE sales.quantity > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, city FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM orders WHERE order_date = '2022-01-01');
SELECT emp_name, emp_role FROM employees WHERE emp_role = 'Manager' ORDER BY emp_name;
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer, SUM(total_price) AS revenue FROM drugs JOIN sales ON drugs.drug_id = sales.drug_id GROUP BY drug_name HAVING SUM(total_price) > 1000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
